ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var owner="UHIS" var date=now() as String { format: "yyyy-MM-dd" } --- { national_id: payload.covidCase.nationalID, street_address: payload.covidCase.address.streetAddress, country: payload.covidCase.address.country, city: payload.covidCase.address.city, date_of_birth: payload.covidCase.dateOfBirth, case_type: payload.covidCase.caseType, last_name: payload.covidCase.lastName, source: payload.covidCase.source, national_id_type: payload.covidCase.nationalIDType, update_date: date, create_by: owner, phone: payload.covidCase.phone, case_id: payload.covidCase.caseID , state: payload.covidCase.address.state, postal: payload.covidCase.address.postal, update_by: owner, first_name: payload.covidCase.firstName, email: payload.covidCase.email }

db:update.doc:name: Update Covid Case Data into DataBase
db:update.db:sql: update cvd_case_master set source=:source, case_type=:case_type, first_name=:first_name, last_name=:last_name, phone=:phone, email=:email, date_of_birth=To_date(:date_of_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), national_id=:national_id, national_id_type=:national_id_type, street_address=:street_address, city=:city, state=:state, postal=:postal, country=:country, update_date=To_date(:update_date,'YYYY-MM-DD'), create_by=:create_by, update_by=:update_by where case_id =:case_id
